backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as a placeholder backend with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the brand rename to 'ProSellers' across the landing page, listing affected files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing each component's purpose, styling, and key features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base CSS file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens including background, foreground, card, sidebar, and chart variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point setting the page title to 'ProSellers | Amazon Growth Consultant' and mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that composes all 9 landing page sections in order with animated SectionConnector dividers between them, plus sticky Navigation and Footer.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: About section featuring Mayur Sahu's headshot with gold corner accents, a credentials list with CheckCircle icons, and scroll-triggered slide-in animations for left and right columns.
frontend/src/components/CaseStudiesSecti: Case studies section displaying three client result cards with animated count-up metric counters and Recharts bar charts comparing before/after KPIs like ACOS, revenue, and conversion rate.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Minimal dark footer displaying the 'ProSellers â€” Amazon Growth Consultant' brand, dynamic copyright year, and a caffeine.ai attribution link with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Full-screen hero section with an animated particle canvas, parallax scroll effect, intersection-observer-triggered badge reveal, and a count-up animation for a years-of-experience stat.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Fixed top navigation bar with scroll-aware styling, smooth-scroll links to page sections, a 'Book Call' CTA button, and a responsive hamburger menu for mobile.
frontend/src/components/PositioningSecti: Static section that defines the target audience using a headline and a 2-column grid of checkmark bullet points (e.g., revenue range, seller type).
frontend/src/components/PricingSection.t: Three-tier pricing section (Starter, Growth, Elite) with intersection-observer reveal animations, staggered card transitions, and a CTA button on each plan.
frontend/src/components/ProblemSection.t: Grid of six problem cards (e.g., high ACOS, account suspension) with icons and descriptions, revealed via staggered intersection-observer animations.
Four-service grid (Amazon Growth, Brand Development, Emergency Services, eBay Management) with numbered cards, icons, and staggered scroll-reveal animations.
frontend/src/components/StrategyCallSect: A landing page section for booking a free 30-minute Amazon growth strategy call, featuring a contact form with name/email/store URL fields and a Calendly placeholder with scroll-triggered reveal animations.
frontend/src/components/TestimonialsSect: Displays a grid of five client testimonial cards with star ratings, names, and country flags, using IntersectionObserver for staggered scroll-reveal animations.
frontend/src/components/WhyChooseSection: Renders a five-card grid highlighting key differentiators (direct expert access, cost savings, limited slots, performance-driven, long-term partnership) with icons and scroll-reveal animations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, returning either an authenticated or anonymous actor based on the current Internet Identity, and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder module with no backend queries, exported as an empty object since the site is a static landing page.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet importing Google Fonts and Tailwind, defining CSS variables, custom utility classes (glass-card, reveal animations, gold accents), and base styles for the dark-themed landing page.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, extending the default theme with custom brand colors (gold, navy, silver), typography fonts, box shadows, border radii, and keyframe animations. Includes plugins for typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Tracks the current project state (version 7) for a premium Amazon Growth Consultant landing page, documenting existing features, architectural notes, known issues, and design decisions for all 12+ sections.
